UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The Antimicrobial Peptide LJ-hep2 from Lateolabrax japonicus Exerting Activities against Multiple Pathogenic Bacteria and Immune Protection In Vivo.
Literature.Author: Gong R, An Z, Zhang W, Chen F, Wang KJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Shigella flexneri CGMCC 1.1868(MIC=6µM),Shigella flexneri CGMCC 1.1868(MBC=6µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens CGMCC 1.3202(MIC=12µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens CGMCC 1.3202(MBC=12µM),Pseudomonas stutzeri CGMCC 1.1803(MIC=3µM),Pseudomonas stutzeri CGMCC 1.1803(MBC=6µM),Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.2389(MIC=12µM),Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.2389(MBC=12µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.2421(MIC=12µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.2421(MBC=12µM),Aeromonas hydrophila CGMCC 1.2017(MIC=48µM),Aeromonas hydrophila CGMCC 1.2017(no activity data),Aeromonas hydrophila CGMCC 1.2017(MBC=48µM),Edwardsiella tarda(MIC=48µM),Edwardsiella tarda(MBC=48µM),Aeromonas sobria(MIC=48µM),Aeromonas sobria(MBC=48µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis CGMCC 1.4260(MIC=12µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis CGMCC 1.4260(MBC=12µM),Corynebacterium glutamicum CGMCC 1.1886(MIC=6µM),Corynebacterium glutamicum CGMCC 1.1886(MBC=6µM),Bacillus subtilis CGMCC 1.3358(MIC=12µM),Bacillus subtilis CGMCC 1.3358(MBC=12µM),Cryptococcus neoformans CGMCC 2.1563(MIC=24µM),Cryptococcus neoformans CGMCC 2.1563(MFC=48µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=3µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MBC=6µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=6µM),Escherichia coli(MBC=6-12µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=12µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=24µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=12-24µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MBC=12-48µM),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=12µM),Enterococcus faecium(MBC=12µM)
